title: The Rittenhouse That Kyle Built
itunes:title: The Rittenhouse That Kyle Built
description:
Charlamagne Tha God discusses the Second Amendment and gives his take on Black people owning legal firearms as a form of self-defense and self-care.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
